prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab: dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa'i bstan rim chen mo'i don bsdu'am lam rim bzhugs so |

jo bos chos bzhi dang ldan pa la brten dgos par gsungs te || mkhas pas lta ba khyad du mi gsod pa |
btsun pas tshul khrims khyad du mi gsod pa || tshe 'di don du mi gnyer ba | byang chub don gnyer ba'o ||

rje btsun sgam po pa'i
zhal nas || chos gsum dang ldan par gsungs te || shes rab chen pos gzhan gyis lam sna 'khrid pa | snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa || tshe 'di la ltos pa ma mchis pa'o ||

bla ma rin po che yis ||
gsol ba 'debs pa'i bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni
gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid ||
skad cig nyid la 'char ba gang ||
bla ma rin chen lta bu'i sku ||
rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud ||

jo bo'i zhal nas | sangs rgyas
dngos bzhugs tsam na bla ma dkon mchog bzhi pa yin | sangs rgyas 'das nas 'khor dag yod tsam na bla ma de sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa yin | da lta sangs rgyas las lhag pa yin gsung ste | de la rgyu mtshan gsum sangs rgyas thams cad
kyi 'phrin las bsdus pa yin pas na bla ma de sangs rgyas las lhag | snyigs ma lnga'i dus su skyob pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag | byang chub kyi lam dngos su ston pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag go | de ltar yin pa yang | tshogs chen po yis
lung ston dpal la phyag 'tshal lo || sems can nyam thag gnas nas 'don la || dngos su ston cing dri ma bral la bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo || zhes gsungs so ||

dge bshes stod lung pa'i zhal nas | nga la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed cig byas na | khyed kyis rgas su khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed na dang khyod dga' ste || bskyed la bzhag gi sems pa srid de ma skyed na yang ma skyes
su la gnod lta ba yin gsung skad de de mad pa yin gsung || de bas na bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes gsha' ma gcig skyes na gnas skabs dang mthar thug gis yon tan gong ma kun 'byung ba'o || de la sgrub pa'i bsnyen bkur ni | nyon mongs pa
dang nyes spyod spongs pa dang | dge ba la brtson pa gnyis yin te || de ltar ma byas na bla ma'i bka' bcag pa yin gsung ngo ||

mgon po byams pa'i zhal nas ||
bkur sti rnyed pa dag dang rim gro dang ||
sgrub pa'i sgo nas bshes gnyen bsten par bya ||
zhes gsungs so||

dpal nA ro pas tI lo pa'i phyag phyir lo bcu gnyis 'brangs nas | dka' ba bcu gnyis
spyad pas dngos grub thob pa bzhin du || mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnams ma bsgrubs kyang thob bo || grangs su ma chad pa ni | sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' med pa bla ma la brten te 'byung bas bgreng bar mi lang ba'o ||

nA ro pas ri rab gser gyi ngos
la bya gnas pa || rang gi rang bzhin dor nas gser du snang zhes so ||

rje sgam po pa'i zhal nas kyang | 'chi ba sgom pa ni dang por gal che ste | chos la 'jug pa'i
rgyu yin || bar du gal che ste brtson 'grus kyi lcag yin | tha mar gal che ste chos kyi sku gsal 'debs yin ces gsungs so ||

jo bo'i
bzhed kyis smon pa ni 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba yin la 'jug pa ni rgyu la dam 'cha' ba'o || de'i go ba ni | smon pa 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba ni | 'bras bu gzhan don du
byang chub thob par bya ba'o zhes dam 'cha' ba'o || 'jug pa rgyu la dam 'cha' ba ni | gzhan don du byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rgyu byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la bslab par bya'o zhes dam 'cha' ba'o ||

kho bos ni gzhung bltas na 'di ltar go ste | gzhan don du byang chub thob
par 'dod pa ni smon pa yin la | gzhan don du byang chub thob par 'dod pa 'i don du bslab pa la slom par 'dod pa 'jug pa yin | de yang bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa rkyang pa ni ma yin te | byang chub ni ched du bya ba'i dmigs pa yin la | bslab pa ni dngos kyi dmigs pa yin pas |
gnyis ka thob pa dang slob par 'dod pa'o || slob dpon zhi ba lha dang jo bo'i bzhed pa yang de ltar yin par go ||

ni chos drug dang ldan te | theg pa chen po'i chos la dad cing mos pa dang | thob shing shes pa dang | rigs dang ldan pa dang | bla ma la gus pa dang | smon pa brten pa dang | jo bo'i lugs kyi so so thar pa rigs bdun gang rung gcig dang ldan pa'o ||

jo bos de'i steng du snying rje dang bsnan pas chos bzhi ldan 'dod de | lam sgron las |
sdom pa'i cho ga la mkhas dang | bdag nyid gang zhig sdom la gnas | sdom pa 'bogs bzod snying rjer ldan | bla ma bzang por shes par bya ||
zhes gsungs so ||

kha cig na re | snum khur dang | dbyugs pa'i rigs pas so so thar pa'i thun mong ba bzhi yang | de bzhi don gyi go bar 'gyur te |rnyed dang bkur sti la chags pas | bdag la bstod cing
gzhan la smod pa dang | ser snas bdag gi nor gzhan la ma byin pa dang | khros pas gzhan la tshogs pa dang | rmongs pas chos ltar bcos par smra na yang ltung ba 'gyur na | rim pa bzhin du chags pas mi tshangs par spyod pa dang | gzhan gyi nor brkus
pa dang | gzhan gyi srog gcod pa dang | brdzun du smra ba rnams lta smos su yang med do || zhes gsungs pa de ni rigs so gsungs sogsungs ngo ||
kha cig kun rdzob shes pa'i shes rab dang | don dam shes pa'i shes rab bo || tha mi dad pa shes pa'i shes rab la yang 'dod do ||

jo bos ni |
lnga po thabs yin la | shes rab dang gnyis su 'dod do || de yang shes rab pha rol phyin spangs pa'i || sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin la sogs || dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad dag || rgyal ba rnams kyi thabs su bshad |
zhes gsungs so ||
kha cig tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i | sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims kyi dngos gzhi yin zhes zer ro ||

jo bos | thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab dang | shes rab dang
bral thabs dag kyang | gang phyir 'ching pa zhes gsungs pa | de bas gnyis ka spang mi bya | zhes pa ste |

grub chen sa ra has mdzad pa'i do ha las |
snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang ||
des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no ||
'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgoms na yang ||
'khor ba 'di las thar pa thob mi 'gyur ||
gang yang gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa des ||
'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas ||
zhes pa'o ||

thub pa'i bstan la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul || bla ma'i gsungs dang lung la bstan nas bris || de las byung ba'i dge ba gang thob des || 'gro rnams log pa'i lam du mi 'gro zhing || yang dag laM zhugs sku
gsum thob par shog ||
bdag kyang thub pa'i bstan pa rgyas byed cing || yang dag lam zhugs sku gsum thob nas kyang || lhun grub rgyun chad med pa'i 'phrin las kyis || nam mkha' mnyam pa'i 'gro ba sgrol bar shog ||

sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul
lam blo sbyong 'am lam rim zhes bya ba ni gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas kyiskyi gsang phur sbyar ba'o ||
